org.apache.streams.util.oauth.tokens.tokenmanager

Interface SimpleTokenManager<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTokenManager

    public interface SimpleTokenManager<T>
    Manages access to oauth tokens. Allows a caller to add tokens to the token pool and receive an available token.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAllTokensToPool(Collection<T> tokens)
      Adds a Collection of tokens to the available token pool.
      boolean addTokenToPool(T token)
      Adds a token to the available token pool.
      T getNextAvailableToken()
      Get an available token.
      int numAvailableTokens()
      Get the number of available tokens.

    • Method Detail

      • addTokenToPool

        boolean addTokenToPool(T token)
        Adds a token to the available token pool.
        Parameters:
        token - Token to be added
        Returns:
        true, if token was successfully added to the pool and false otherwise.

      • addAllTokensToPool

        boolean addAllTokensToPool(Collection<T> tokens)
        Adds a Collection of tokens to the available token pool.
        Parameters:
        tokens - Tokens to be added
        Returns:
        true, if the token pool size increased after adding the tokens, and false otherwise.

      • getNextAvailableToken

        T getNextAvailableToken()
        Get an available token. If no tokens are available it returns null.
        Returns:
        next available token

      • numAvailableTokens

        int numAvailableTokens()
        Get the number of available tokens.
        Returns:
        number of available tokens
